channel.title: Shannon Sharpe on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Shannon Sharpe on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Shannon Sharpe Out at ESPN
item.description: The former NFL star turned ‘First Take’ pundit had stepped aside earlier this year after being accused of sexual assault in a lawsuit. Sharpe settled the suit earlier this month.

item.title: Shannon Sharpe Out at ESPN
item.description: The former NFL star turned ‘First Take’ pundit had stepped aside earlier this year after being accused of sexual assault in a lawsuit. Sharpe settled the suit earlier this month.

item.title: Shannon Sharpe Settles $50 Million Rape Lawsuit
item.description: The lawsuit accused Sharpe of assaulting a woman at her Las Vegas home. A lawyer for the accuser acknowledged that the two had a “long-term consensual and tumultuous relationship.”
